parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterProxyType
parameters.description:
The type of proxy cluster that is used. Valid values:

*   **service**: service-based traffic mirroring.
*   **cname**: reverse proxy.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the node group that you want to query.

parameters.name: GroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the node group. Valid values:

*   **protect**
*   **control**
*   **storage**
*   **controlStorage**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

> You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou:** the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1:** outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
